mapper.select: SELECT id , name , sort , restaurant_id AS restaurantId FROM menu_group WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND used = 1 ORDER BY sort

SELECT A.id AS menu_group_id , A.name AS menu_group_name , A.restaurant_id , B.id AS menu_id , B.name AS menu_name , B.intr_dc , C.id AS file_id , C.origFilename , C.serverFilename , C.filePath , C.size FROM menu_group A LEFT OUTER JOIN menu B ON A.id = B.menu_group_id AND B.used = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN files C ON B.file_id = C.id WHERE A.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND A.used = 1 ORDER BY A.sort, B.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_group(name, sort, restaurant_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{sort}, #{restaurantId})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu_group SET used = 0 , update_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
